email_body:
Subject: Appointment Confirmation for John Doe
Hi Dr. Lee,
This is a reminder that patient John Doe (MRN 004992) has a follow-up appointment on March 10, 2025 at 2:30 PM.
Please call him at (206) 555-6789 if rescheduling is needed.
Best,
Reception Team

Subject: Lab Results: Jane Smith
Attached are the lab results for Jane Smith, DOB 04/22/1989.
Results show mild elevation in glucose.
Please notify the patient at jane.smith@email.com or 425-555-9012.
Thank you,
Lab Services

Patient Michael Brown (MRN 007321) called regarding refill for Lisinopril 10 mg.
He mentioned he’s been out since June 2 and will pick up at Walgreens on 4th Ave, Seattle.

Sarah Johnson, Policy ID 9988776655, called today to update her insurance provider to BlueCross WA.
Her contact is 360-555-4421 or sarah.johnson@healthmail.com.

William Green was admitted to Harborview ER at 3:45 AM after a fall at his residence 1234 Pine St, Seattle.
Contact next of kin Laura Green at (425) 555-1234.

Patient Emily Watson (MRN 98231) received a bill for $640 on Oct 12 2025 that appears incorrect.
Please verify charges with insurance ID POL-772-9912.

Pt is 48 yo male John Harris with past HTN, seen on 9/15/25 for follow-up.
Vitals: BP 140/90, Pulse 78.
Plan: Increase Losartan to 100 mg daily.
Follow-up call at (503) 555-6677.

Please schedule a cardiology referral for patient Olivia Parker, DOB 06/30/1972.
She prefers Dr. Han’s office on Madison St.
Contact her via olivia.parker@medmail.com or (253) 555-0142.

Subject: Telehealth visit for Jacob Miller
Your virtual appointment with Dr. Nguyen is set for July 8 2025 at 10 AM.
Join via Zoom link sent to jacob.miller@email.com or call 425-555-7712 for assistance.

Following up on patient Daniel Reed’s knee surgery performed on 08/11/2025 at Swedish Hospital.
Patient can be reached at (206) 555-9911 or daniel.reed@clinicmail.org.
